name: ZK International Group Co., Ltd.
description: ZK International Group Co., Ltd. is a leading innovator in the manufacturing and distribution of high-quality stainless steel piping products and a provider of advanced solutions for the water and gas industries. Established in 2006 and headquartered in Xiamen, China, ZK International specializes in the production of stainless steel pipes, fittings, and related materials, catering primarily to the construction and infrastructure markets. The company leverages state-of-the-art technology and stringent quality control to ensure that its products meet international standards. ZK International is committed to sustainability and environmental protection, focusing on the development of eco-friendly products that reduce carbon footprints and enhance energy efficiency. Through its advanced R&D capabilities, ZK International continuously invests in innovative solutions that address the evolving needs of the global market. The company operates a robust distribution network, providing timely delivery and exceptional customer service across various regions. As it expands its footprint, ZK International aims to lead the industry in providing sustainable piping solutions that contribute to a greener future.

seo.meta_title: ZK International Group Co., Ltd. | Innovative Piping Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore ZK International Group Co., Ltd., a leader in stainless steel piping products and advanced solutions for the water and gas industries. Discover our commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What products does ZK International offer?
faq.answer: ZK International offers stainless steel pipes, fittings, flanges, and water and gas distribution systems.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of ZK International?
faq.answer: Jianhui (Jack) Zhang is the CEO of ZK International Group Co., Ltd.

faq.question: Where is ZK International headquartered?
faq.answer: ZK International is headquartered in Xiamen, Fujian, China.
